items.title: Commercial Van
items.description: Also known as cargo tires, commercial van tires feature a C at the end of the tire's size and are built with durable, long-lasting materials to help drivers as they haul packages in pickup and delivery applications.

header.subtitle: Consistently rated as excellent by 195-70r15 drivers
Most popular among drivers in PA
Most popular among drivers in PA

content.body:
### Shop 195/70R15 Tire Size
What kinds of vehicles are rolling on 195/70R15 tires? Commercial vans like the Dodge Sprinter 3500 and Freightliner Sprinter 3500, plus older vehicles like the Buick Regal, Maserati Merak, and Pontiac 6000. 

Popular vehicles
2003-2006 Dodge Sprinter 3500
2002-2006 Freightliner Sprinter 3500
1988 Buick Regal
1980-1982 Maserati Merak
1989-1991 Pontiac 6000

All-season tires are designed to perform year-round, making them a common choice for most drivers. Consider the Continental Vanco 4 Season,[General Grabber HD](https://simpletire.com/brands/general-tires/grabber-hd), and Nokian cLine if you need a set of 195/70R15 tires that offers great traction and performance year-round.

While all-season tires are great year-round, they might struggle in dense ice and snow. Fortunately, winter tires are engineered to stay flexible in sub-freezing temperatures for consistent traction in icy, slush, and snow. Take a look at the Nokian Hakkapeliitta CR3,[Winguard Winspike SUV](https://simpletire.com/brands/nexen-tires/winguard-winspike-suv), and Federal Glacier GC01 if you need a dedicated set of 195/70R15 winter tires for your ride.

Whether you drive a Dodge Sprinter 3500, Freightliner Sprinter 3500, Pontiac 6000, or something else, SimpleTire has a set of 195/70R15 tires that meets your needs at a great price!

info.title: Did you know?
info.body: A reliable brand is the #1 ask for most drivers. Here you can shop all the most popular brands and discover new ones – all tested, ranked and rated by our customers.
